title: Find an Expert Source for a Science Story
description: A reporter is writing about a new medical breakthrough and needs to find a qualified, independent expert to comment on the research.

tasks.description: Search academic databases for scientists who have published research on the relevant topic but are not affiliated with the original study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of potential expert sources with their publication histories.

tasks.description: Find the contact information for the top three potential experts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves university or institutional email addresses and phone numbers.

tasks.description: Draft a concise email to the experts introducing the story and requesting a brief interview.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent composes a professional and clear interview request.
